title._content: Joe Oliver and branding crew at the Joe Oliver Ranch, near John Day, Oregon, 1951

description._content: Original Collection: Extension and Experiment Station Communications Photograph Collection (P120) Item Number: P120:03224 Image Description: The crew uses a tilt table to brand cattle with. The crew can dehorn, brand, castrate and give each animal a shot within 60 seconds. Joe Oliver is the man handling the branding iron. You can find this image by searching for the item number by clicking here. Want more? You can find more digital resources online.
